lead_paragraph: Because everyone needs a little laugh during these times of economic uncertainty. We've compiled some recent cartoons about the financial crisis and efforts to prevent the next one from being as bad.
snippet: From the DealBook Spring 2010 special section: Cartoons about finance and financial reform. Because everyone needs a little laught during these times of economic uncertainty.
abstract: From the DealBook Spring 2010 special section: Cartoons about finance and financial reform. Because everyone needs a little laught during these times of economic uncertainty.
